info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 29 at 8:42PM CDT until August 5 at 5:01AM CDT by NWS Des Moines IA
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Des Moines IA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa...
Cedar River at Cedar Falls affecting Black Hawk County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...The Cedar River at Cedar Falls, or from the West Fork Cedar River to the Cedar Falls-Waterloo city limits.
* WHEN...From Wednesday evening to Tuesday, August 05.
* IMPACTS...At 92.2 feet, Water affects the southeast corner of Gateway Park.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 87.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 91.9 feet Friday evening. It will then fall below flood stage late Monday evening. - Flood stage is 89.0 feet.
info.instruction:
For the latest waterway observations and forecasts refer to weather.gov/desmoines/water.
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
River forecasts include observed precipitation plus forecast precipitation over the next 24 hours.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING TO TUESDAY, AUGUST 05... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WATCH
